quotes.quote: Broken vows are like broken mirrors. They leave those who held to them bleeding and staring at fractured images of themselves.
Eggs and oaths are easily broken.
Promises and pie crusts are made to be broken.
Some persons make promises for the pleasure of breaking them.
Some promises are better left unsaid.
Promises are like crying babies in a theater, they should be carried out at once.
Liars make the best promises.
Sometimes your pledges become your problems.
But promises based on ignorance always prove disappointing.
Promises mean everything, but after they are broken, sorry means nothing.
Oaths are but words, and words but wind.
He loses his thanks who promises and delays.
A promise made is a debt unpaid.
For every promise, there is price to pay.
Promises are like the full moon, if they are not kept at once they diminish day by day.
One must have a good memory to be able to keep the promises one makes.
Better break your word than do worse in keeping it.
The promise given was a necessity of the past: the word broken is a necessity of the present.
When a man repeats a promise again and again, he means to fail you.
It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
Promises may fit the friends, but non-performance will turn them into enemies.
There is no greater fraud than a promise not kept.
Breach of promise is a base surrender of truth.
The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
Promises make debt, and debt makes promises.
We must not promise what we ought not, lest we be called on to perform what we cannot.
When a man takes an oath... he's holding his own self in his own hands. Like water. And if he opens his fingers then - he needn't hope to find himself again.
All promise outruns performance.
Better a broken promise than none at all.
He spoke again as if he hadn’t just shattered his promise and her security. Her house of glass now lay in a pile of shards.
Don't make any promises that you can't keep.
The world is always changing. Learn how to allow for it. Someone makes a promise, and then they break it.
Trust, is the stone thrown into the sea, sinking deep in all its murkiness, unable to see what it once lived and believed to be a promise.
When you have a dream and someone makes promises they keep breaking, it is hard to recover. You lose hope.
Far too often, the best thing I can have in my hand when someone makes a promise is a really big broom so that I can sweep up the broken pieces.
Promises are about as good as already chewed-up gum.
His words were like Satin on her Skin. She just picked the lies she liked the best.
At the point that our promises have become tactics to get what we want verses commitments that we intend to keep, the only thing that we are promising is the delivery of a broken promise.
Broken promises are the worst. Better not to promise anything.
It felt liked a broken promise. Like the Fisher King's wound; never heals.
A broken promise is like a child's pinwheel, you've got to be yourself or at least within the confines.
Don't say that I'm crazy not overreacting  / I'm just placing all the facts and then you leave me broken / Promises promises  / You making broken promises
Promises promises  / You making broken promises  / That's all I get  / And I'm like where your mind is at your heart don't wanna be / And I'm like where your mind it at your heart don't wanna be no
Feeling I could hold you, And you want me to / But all your broken promises, Heartache through and through / Looking for directions, Should I go or stay / All your broken promises Getting in the way

All your broken promises Getting out of hand / Running out of patience, Losing ground for speed / All your broken promises, May just kill the need / You're the right kind of lover, But you're looking for cover
Your broken promises can lose it all / Undecided things, While waiting in the wings / or the start of the show / To make a move and let it flow over me
Head to head, face to face / Out of time,Out of place / Back to back, bound to fall / With broken promises we lose all...
Nothing but broken promises / Everyday, promises / Fair weather, promises / No matter where look our go I find the opposite / In this around this is nothing but broken promises
You promised everything / But that was yesterday / You threw it all away / Ain't it a shame / Love's a game / Full of broken promises
All the broken promises / Love could never be like this / Lips that give the tender kiss / Make the broken promises
So what's left that I should ever feel / Cause since the day you left me I have been so alone / And now we're left with broken promises / My heart can't take no more
The road I walk is paved with the broken / promises I made  / At least a million times I've fallen / but never will I break
I scattered in the breeze / Living on memories / Everywhere I look / As far as I can see / Broken promises, broken promises / Pieces of me...
All that I remember now / Are people and shadows / Broken promises, broken promises / Pieces of me...No connection
Forgive, forget all of our broken promises / We run, run, run to loose it all / These days, are darker and they draw me in / And I left a trail but no one missed me in, in the end
Take your broken promises, and don't come back again / It's time to say goodbye, I'm gonna leave you where you lie
I told you in confidence / And trusted you'd never sacrifice our silence / I rise from the ashes / And remains of your broken promises
I've tried to change but they always around, pulling me down in bed / Gave you my word but they were just broken promises
Now you're breaking my heart  / With all your broken promises / You say you're gonna do this  / And you say you're gonna do that  / But you never come through
Throw it all away / Empty promises, broken dreams / All reminders of what we could have been

I should've seen it coming, running with a fallen angel / Living on a broken promise when the day is through / Trying to make a life for us, I only knew it my way / I'm just a shadow on the highway, fade to blue / Fade to blue
My distant colours still bleeding / A broken promise for the soul / Never loving, never healing
The path of least resistance / Is catching up with me again today / I'm broken down, not good enough / The broken promises add up / To twice their weight in tears which I have caused
Broken sticks and broken stones / Will turn to dust just like our bones again today / I'm broken down / Not good enough / The broken promises add up again today
His promises were, as he then was, mighty; But his performance, as he is now, nothing.
Broken promises , like a broken glass, is hard to replace.
Broken promises like delayed gratification / is like paying for trip / Long before the vacation / Is like forever paying forward / with no returns on your investment
Broken promises like stored up treasures / robbing the soul of temporary pleasures / But never delivering on what is envisioned / without any explanation of your expectation

Broken promises life scratch records / a nonstop reminder of what is to be / With no how, no what, no when / or where it suppose to end / But expects you to keep on believing / that soon you will be receiving

Broken promises putting your life on hold until this great thing happens / Living temporary forever to be told hold on just a little bit longer / The wait will amke you stronger / you have no other choice but to wait / Ask for patience and try and keep the faith
We have to constantly see ourselves as better, more deserving, and more right than everyone else. Which is why so many of us keep falling for the empty promises of power and control.
Broken promises like glass upon the floor / Shattered dreaming like haze upon the morn
Broken promises bonds coming undone / Wasting away the years are build up
Broken promises wash away like sand / Leaving nothing but crushed promises in my hand / Break me / You break me down
Mankind can make promises and break them. The truth is mankind doesn't always keep their promises.
Our life is reflected on the broken vows of a broken-marriage and can't seem to get over the fact that he let you down and he had a changed of heart that turned into stone.
Many marriages failed is due to broken vows and broken promises and when this lead to the downfall of a marriage; you may start to feel that you cannot trust others.
Pain is eased. Rules are broken / Promises---forgotten. Trust betrayed / Love cools. Hate dies. / Stars fall. Things change / Life ends, but -- God is always God!
Decisions and promises can be made, and also broken due to sudden unexpected changes.
